price: Na hakika wewe unafundishwa Qur'ani inayo tokana kwake Mwenye hikima Mwenye kujua.
arabic: وَإِنَّكَ لَتُلَقَّى ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ مِن لَّدُنۡ حَكِيمٍ عَلِيمٍ
footnotes: Ewe Nabii! Wewe unapokea Qur'ani hii unayo teremshiwa kutokana na Yeye ambaye hapana anaye mkaribia kwa hikima yake, naye anajua kila kitu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-innaka latulaqqā al-qur'āna min ladun ḥakīmin ʿalīmin
